00011 void set_random_seed(const char *arg)
00012 {
00013   int seed = atoi(arg);
00014   if (seed < 1) {
00015     std::cout << "Seed set to 1.  Only positive random seeds are allowed.\n";
00016     seed = 1;
00017   }
00018 
00019   std::stringstream random_seed_stream;
00020   random_seed_stream << "set-random-seed " << seed;
00021   std::string random_seed_string = random_seed_stream.str();
00022   std::cout << RL_agent_message(random_seed_string.c_str());
00023   std::cout << RL_env_message(random_seed_string.c_str());
00024 }
00025 
00026 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00027 {
00028   if (argc > 1) set_random_seed(argv[1]);
00029   
00030   RL_init();
00031   for (unsigned i = 0; i < NUM_EPISODES; ++i) {
00032     RL_episode(NUM_STEPS);
00033     std::cout << RL_return() << "\t" << RL_num_steps() << "\n" << std::flush;
00034   }
00035 
00036   std::cout << RL_agent_message("write-policy raw-pi.dat");
00037

00039   
00040   return 0;
